name: MHConnect
0:
”Alexa, ask mobile help to test device”
”Alexa, ask Mobile Help about circle members”
”Alexa, ask Mobile Help to find my mobile device”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mobile help
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The new MobileHelp skill allows customers and their caregivers to get information about their MobileHelp account or devices by engaging with the MH Connect application. Whether you need the last location of your mobile device, or just need the phone number for customer care, you can simple request this information through Alexa.
To use this skill with the invocation phrase, you will need to link to your existing MobileHelp account. If you are currently not a MobileHelp subscriber, please call 1-877-827-6201 or visit www.mobilehelp.com).

PLEASE NOTE: this skill is NOT an emergency response service, nor can it be used as one. In any emergency, please utilize your MobileHelp medical alert device.
